original_title: Polifonias - Paci é saluta, Michel Giacometti
overview: Traveling by the experience and by the roots of one of the strongest manifestations of Portuguese popular culture – singing polyphonic Alentejo. Evoking Michel Giacometti, the film questions the origins of the “sing” in the context of Mediterranean culture.
title: Polifonias - Paci é saluta, Michel Giacometti
